thread.title: Ruplanaik

author: Ruplanaik
title: Ruplanaik
text: B&H has been an excellent web merchant with consistently reliable service. Their website is one of the easiest to navigate. I have bought from them dozens of times and it has always been a positive experience. They seem to have better stock of items I have looked for than Amazon and their prices are very competitive. On one occasion I had to return an item and it was handled promptly and without any hassle by their customer service department. Highly recommended.
